context:
### Idiom: 故作高深
### Meaning: 本来并不高深，故意装出高深的样子。多指文章故意用些艰深词语，掩饰内容的浅薄。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 对史家司马迁的行处叙事，多有指责。他对宋儒朱熹的解经提出了批评，认为“宋儒所解，则揄扬过侈，牵扯过甚，故作高深。”陈天祥《四书辨疑》多引王若虚说。
target: There are many criticisms of the historian Sima Qian's narration of his travels. He criticized the interpretation of scriptures by Song Confucian Zhu Xi, believing that "the interpretation by Song Confucianists was too extravagant, too involved, and pretended to be profound." Chen Tianxiang often cited Wang Ruoxu's comments in "Four Books on Doubts".

context:
### Idiom: 能伸能屈
### Meaning: 能弯曲也能伸直。指人在失意时能忍耐，在得志时能大干一番。比喻好坏环境都能适应。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 还得是咱颜淡机灵，打不过就怂，靠山来了就横，真的是能伸能屈啊。笑不活了！
target: It's still our clever and calm Yan Dan, who knows when to back down when he can't win, and becomes bold when he has support. He really knows when to bend and when to stand tall. I can't stop laughing!

context:
### Idiom: 粗中有细
### Meaning: 表面似乎粗率，实际却很细致；平时比较粗率，有时却很细致。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 除了牛肉面，他们的麻辣鸭血豆腐煲也相当受欢迎，份量实在大到夸张，整个是用大碗公来装，而且点这个麻辣煲还会附红茶或冬瓜茶，算是类似套餐。麻辣汤头粗中有细，有香有辣且不会给人感觉很油腻，和一般无脑辣味的麻辣烫汤头是有差别的，我觉得有厉害不少，建议一定要热热喝，味道会更棒。里头有牛肉片、贡丸、米血、臭豆腐、鸭血、豆皮、青菜，再加上主食选的王子面，丰富程度根本就像是麻辣小火锅了，食材都非常入味，尤其鸭血和豆腐更是我们的最爱，不过因为份量真的太大，食量一般的人不建议点。
target: Apart from their beef noodles, their spicy duck blood tofu hotpot is also very popular. The portion size is incredibly large, served in a big bowl. Moreover, ordering this spicy hotpot also comes with either black tea or winter melon tea, similar to a set meal. The spicy soup base is finely made, it is fragrant and spicy but not greasy, which is different from the typical mindlessly spicy hot soup. I think it's quite impressive, and I recommend drinking it while it's hot, the taste will be even better. Inside, there are beef slices, meatballs, rice blood, stinky tofu, duck blood, tofu skin, and greens. Plus, the main course is prince noodles, the richness is just like a mini spicy hotpot, all the ingredients are very flavorful, especially the duck blood and tofu which are our favorites. However, because the portion is really large, it is not recommended for people with average appetites.

context:
### Idiom: 青天霹雳
### Meaning: 霹雳响雷。晴天打响雷。比喻突然发生意外的，令人震惊的事件。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 一天，姜铲和是姴进入二花院，那里只有柳嘏和陆浩，变得很吵。一屋三高！正当我以为春风轻拂二花院和达诺的心时，青天霹雳落下。他让我交出二花院，因为我欠我已故的父亲。
target: One day, Kang Chan and Sae Tak entered the two-flower gardens, where there were only Lian Yu and Lu Hao, and it became very noisy. One room! When I thought the spring had broken through the Two Flower Gardens and Da Non's heart, a thunderstorm fell. He asked me to give up the Two Flower Gardens because I owed it to my dead father.

context:
### Idiom: 濠梁之上
### Meaning: 濠梁濠水上的桥。指别有会心，自得其乐的境地。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 因濠河（古称濠水）穿城东而过，汇入淮河。先秦时期，《庄子·秋水》一篇中“庄子与惠子游于濠梁之上”，即发生于此。并作出流传的哲学名句“子非鱼,安知鱼之乐”。
target: Because the Hao River (called Haoshui in ancient times) passes through the east of the city and merges into the Huai River. In the pre-Qin period, "Zhuangzi and Huizi were swimming on Haoliang" in an article in "Zhuangzi Autumn Waters", which happened here. He also made the popular philosophical saying "You are not a fish, how can you know the happiness of fish".

context:
### Idiom: 能伸能屈
### Meaning: 能弯曲也能伸直。指人在失意时能忍耐，在得志时能大干一番。比喻好坏环境都能适应。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 大丈夫能伸能屈…
target: A real man can be flexible and adaptable...

context:
### Idiom: 身外之物
### Meaning: 个人身体以外的东西，指名誉、地位、财产等。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 学生们都深怕自己没有遵循好法师的教诲：“对一切人事物没有占有、控制，你就自在了。”“身体自己就控制不了，你还能控制身外之物吗？”老法师长期只吃一餐，教导学生们学佛人应有的行谊。
target: The students feared that they had not followed the monk's teachings well enough: "When you have no desire for anything, you are free. " "Do you think you can control your body? You can't control anything else, can you? " The old monk has long been eating only one meal a day, teaching his students to practice Buddhism.

context:
### Idiom: 运筹帷幄
### Meaning: 谓在后方决定作战策略。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 看似人畜无害，破绽多，但却是一顶一的武学高手，拥有100%空手接 白刃的强大技能。朝中重臣，生性狡诈阴险，老奸巨猾，心狠手辣，做事滴水不漏，在朝中运筹帷幄，是皇帝之下的二号人物，深得皇帝的宠信。明面上萧慕苓是治国有方的忠臣，但背地里勾结外敌，为了自己的利益通奸卖国。
target: Though seemingly harmless with many flaws, he is in fact a top martial arts master, possessing a powerful skill of being able to catch a blade with his bare hands 100% of the time. A high-ranking official in the court, he is cunning, treacherous, ruthless, and meticulous in his actions, leaving no loose ends. He strategizes within the court, being the second most powerful person under the emperor, and has deeply gained the emperor's trust and favor. On the surface, Xiao Mulin is a loyal minister who governs the country effectively, but behind the scenes, he colludes with foreign enemies and betrays his country for his own interests.

context:
### Idiom: 安邦治国
### Meaning: 使国家安定太平。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 由于建立了新型的军民关系，双方未端一次酒杯，未送一份礼物，车站的工作蒸蒸日上，部队的两万余吨货物源源不断地运到了营建工地。他说，新宪法是新中国建国以来最好的一部宪法，是安邦治国的大法，认真学习和坚决执行，就能保障开创社会主义建设的新局面，实现国民经济翻两番的宏伟目标。
target: As a result of establishing a new military-civilian relationship, without raising a glass of wine or sending a gift, the work at the station is thriving and more than 20,000 tons of goods have been continuously transported to the construction site. He said that the new constitution is the best constitution since the founding of the new China, and it is the Great Law for maintaining the country and governing the people. If it is studied carefully and strictly enforced, it will ensure the creation of a new situation in socialist construction and the achievement of the grand goal of doubling the national economy.

context:
### Idiom: 各取所长
### Meaning: 指要善于运用事物或人本身所具有的长处。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 劳工骑士团是一个对所有工人开放的多元化劳工组织。领导们觉得招募各种背景的成员才能各取所长。成员包括低技能工人、铁路工人、移民和钢铁工人，但是禁止五类人加入：银行家、土地投机者、律师、酒商、赌徒。
target: The Knights of Labor is a diverse labor organization open to all workers. The leaders believe that recruiting members from various backgrounds can bring out the best in everyone. Members include low-skilled workers, railway workers, immigrants, and steel workers, but five types of people are prohibited from joining: bankers, land speculators, lawyers, alcohol merchants, and gamblers.

context:
### Idiom: 不可究诘
### Meaning: 究追查；诘追问。无法追问到底。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: ” 国民参政会参政员陈赓雅兼任美债云南劝储分会委员兼主任干事，负责云南全省的美金公债推销工作，熟悉情况。1945年7月7日，国民参政会第四届大会在重庆开会，陈赓雅根据所掌握的资料写成提案《请政府彻查三十一年度同盟胜利美金公债发行余额大舞弊嫌疑案》，揭发国库局局长吕咸“利用职权，公然将该项未售出之债票，一方逢迎上司，一方自图私利，以致不可究诘，构成侵蚀公款至美金一千一百五十万余元巨额之舞弊行为嫌疑。该项债票市价因之狂涨，由二十元递涨至数百元，刺激物价，扰乱金融，莫此为甚。
target: Chen Gangya, a member of the National Political Council, concurrently served as a member and director of the Yunnan Branch of the United States Treasury Savings Committee, responsible for the promotion of US dollar bonds throughout Yunnan Province. He was familiar with the situation. On July 7, 1945, the Fourth Session of the National Political Council was held in Chongqing, and Chen Gangya submitted a proposal entitled "Requesting the Government to Thoroughly Investigate the Suspected Massive Fraud in the Unsold Bonds of the Allied Victory US Dollar Bonds of the Thirty-First Year", based on the information he had obtained. He exposed the suspected embezzlement behavior of the Director of the State Treasury, Lv咸, who "used his powers to openly sell the unsold bonds to迎合 his superiors and seek personal gain, resulting in an untraceable amount of embezzlement of more than US$11.5 million. As a result, the bond prices soared from US$20 to hundreds of dollars, causing a sharp rise in prices, disrupting the financial system, and this was the most serious."

context:
### Idiom: 细微末节
### Meaning: 末节小事情，小节。无关紧要的小事情，小问题。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 有很强的独立精神和丰富的想象力，在平凡的生活中容易感到厌倦。对细微末节的小事能够明察秋毫，同时又具有豁达的包容力，在群体中容易成为领导者。不愿输给他人，性格中有很强的隐秘的一面，重视隐私，缺乏合作精神，常会引起麻烦。
target: Possesses a strong independent spirit and rich imagination, and easily feels bored in ordinary life. They can discern the smallest details, and also have a broad-minded tolerance, easily becoming a leader in a group. They are unwilling to lose to others, and have a strong secretive side to their character. They value privacy and lack a spirit of cooperation, which often causes trouble.

context:
### Idiom: 天南海北
### Meaning: ①形容距离遥远的不同地区。②形容（谈话）漫无边际。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: “邀请”广大青年，来“共创”这支MV，具有特殊的意义。锁定了这个创意后，成员们立刻投入到工程量巨大的收集素材环节，经过数个日夜连轴转的搜集和筛选，近百个来自天南海北的青年剪影，融入旋律中，奏响同一首青春乐章。画面中，面庞稚嫩的消防员冲出火海，年轻的电力工人百米高空“走钢丝”完成检修任务，青年科技工作者们在运载火箭发射那一刻欢欣鼓舞……这些广为人知的新闻画面，展现了青年在各行各业贡献青春力量的身影。
target: The invitation to young people from all walks of life to co-create this MV holds a special significance. After settling on this idea, the members immediately threw themselves into the massive task of gathering materials. After several days and nights of continuous collection and selection, nearly a hundred silhouettes of young people from all over the country were integrated into the melody, playing the same youthful symphony. In the video, a young firefighter with a tender face rushes out of a sea of flames, a young electrician walks a tightrope a hundred meters high to complete maintenance work, and young science and technology workers are overjoyed at the moment of a rocket launch... These widely known news images show the contributions of young people in various industries.

context:
### Idiom: 盛衰荣辱
### Meaning: 兴盛、衰败、荣耀、耻辱。指人事变化发展的各种情况。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 前总统马英九日前以祭祖名义前往中国大陆访问12天，并且参访抗战遗址和纪念设施，当他赴湖南衡山‘南岳忠烈祠’祭拜时，也意外让台湾民众发现，原来对岸也有一座‘忠烈祠’。而且‘南岳忠烈祠’还曾经是‘国家级’的忠烈祠，当国民政府即将退守台湾之际，中枢最后一次的国殇大典是在这里举办，也曾经被人为毁坏3次，可以说是看尽中华民国在大陆时期的盛衰荣辱。七七卢沟桥事变爆发，日军全面侵华，历经淞沪会战、南京保卫战、徐州会战到武汉会战之后，中国半壁江山，也就是最精华地区，已落入日军敌手，然而蒋中正没有屈服，将国民政府迁至重庆继续抗战，中日两军开始进入相持阶段。
target: Former president Ma Ying-jeou recently visited the mainland for 12 days under the pretext of honoring his ancestors. During his visit to the Hunan province’s Xiangshan South Yue Temple, he also inadvertently discovered that there was another “Yue Temple” on the other side of the strait. In fact, the South Yue Temple was once a “national-level” Yue Temple. During the final national mourning ceremony of the Kuomintang government, which was about to retreat to Taiwan, it was held here. It was once destroyed by man three times. It can be said that it has witnessed the rise and fall of the Republic of China on the mainland. On July 7, 1937, the Lugouqiao incident broke out. The Japanese army launched a full-scale invasion of China. After the Battle of Shanghai, the Battle of Nanjing, the Battle of Xuzhou, and the Battle of Wuhan, China had lost half of its territory, which was the most valuable part of China. The Kuomintang government was forced to move to Chongqing to continue the war, and the two armies entered the stalemate stage.

context:
### Idiom: 走头无路
### Meaning: 绝路。比喻陷入绝境，没有出路。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 总是嘀咕走头无路的人是白痴，不会坐车吗？。
target: People who always complain that they have nowhere to go are idiots. Don’t they know how to ride a car? .

context:
### Idiom: 原形毕露
### Meaning: 本来面目完全暴露。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 夏洛在学校干的坏事传到了家长们的耳中，他们聚集到学校要求学校开除夏洛。夏洛将冬梅误认为邱雅，他刻意模仿马冬梅的走路姿势、笑声以及训练动作，只为搏得女神一笑，马冬梅见夏洛如此侮辱自己，再也装不下去了，转过身来原形毕露准备揍夏洛。闻讯，原先要求开除夏洛的家长们争先恐后地与夏洛妈攀关系，十分滑稽。
target: The bad things that Charlie did at school got back to the parents, who gathered at the school demanding that Charlie be expelled. Charlie mistook Dongmei for Qiu Ya, and he deliberately imitated Ma Dongmei's walking posture, laughter, and training movements, just to win a smile from the goddess. When Ma Dongmei saw that Charlie was insulting her so much, she could no longer pretend and turned around to reveal her true colors, ready to beat Charlie. When the news spread, the parents who had previously demanded Charlie's expulsion rushed to make connections with Charlie's mother, which was very funny.

context:
### Idiom: 不知就里
### Meaning: 不了解内情。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 在体力、时间及Budget均相当有限的情况下，Arthur与行仔的8天行程依然丰富，玩匀海陆空之余，更在制作组安排下，卖港式鸡蛋仔赚盘川，行仔全程豁出去大声叫卖，Arthur则贯彻‘迷男郎’本色迷失到底。今明播放的头两集，出发时喜气洋洋的Arthur和行仔，甫落机即被制作组强行‘开始拍摄’，完全不知就里的二人，在没有剧本及任何资讯的情况下，开始了为期8天的‘丧行’之旅。2人首个任务挑战‘豪华海景野餐’，单是寻找合适景点及食物已行到脚酸，其间更遇上猴子小偷将2人辛苦得来的驰名鸭肉‘毁掉’，令他们要‘返回起点重新出发’。
target: Arthur and Andy's 8 days were filled with enjoyment, while their first mission challenged a luxury seaside BBQ, they already had to travel to exhaustion, while they were met by a monkey thief who destroyed their famous duck, which made them have to 'go back to the beginning and start over'.

context:
### Idiom: 安邦治国
### Meaning: 使国家安定太平。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 唐太宗即位初期，因隋鉴不远，故能励精图治。这个在当时历史条件下安邦治国的重要思想作了非常精辟的论述，其主题是在于提醒唐太宗要想使国家长治久安，君王必须努力积聚德义，具体提出了居安思危，戒奢以俭等十个建议。魏征以此为忧，多次上疏切谏，本文是其中的一篇。
target: In the early days of Tang Taizong's accession to the throne, because the Sui Dynasty was not far away, he was able to make great efforts to govern. This important thought of governing the country under the historical conditions at that time was a very incisive discussion. Its theme was to remind Emperor Taizong of the Tang Dynasty that in order to ensure long-term peace and stability in the country, the king must work hard to accumulate virtue and righteousness. He specifically proposed ten principles such as being prepared for danger in times of peace, abstaining from extravagance and practicing frugality, etc. a suggestion. Wei Zheng was concerned about this and wrote many remonstrances. This article is one of them.

context:
### Idiom: 口直心快
### Meaning: 想什么说什么，为人直爽。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 明面上萧慕苓是治国有方的忠臣，但背地里勾结外敌，为了自己的利益通奸卖国。口直心快，淳朴善良、多愁善感，对身边的人与事都十分热心。。却虽身居高位，但以来没架子，跟百姓与下人都打成一片，在群众间颇受称赞。
target: On the surface, Xiao Mulin is a loyal minister who is adept at governing the country, but behind the scenes, he colludes with foreign enemies, committing treason for his own gain. He is straightforward and quick-witted, simple and kind, and sentimental, showing great enthusiasm towards people and matters around him. Despite holding a high position, he has no airs about him, and gets along well with the common people and subordinates, earning considerable praise among the masses.

context:
### Idiom: 此处不留人，自有留人处
### Meaning: 指这里不可居留，自会有可居留的地方。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 只是部份民宿业者，好像并不怕这一招，比起五一的盈利，这点罚金太小意思了。再者，平台繁多，此处不留人，自有留人处，对于这类无良民宿，仅靠平台按现行规则管制，并不足以纠偏。有内媒评论指出，今次民宿乱象已超出了行业管理的上限，需要法律及时亮剑。
target: Only some homestay operators seem not to be afraid of this move. Compared with the profits during the May Day holiday, this fine is too small. In addition, there are many platforms, and if one place does not keep them, another place will. For these unscrupulous homestays, it is not enough to correct the偏差 only by platforms following the current rules. An internal media commentary pointed out that the current乱象 in homestays has exceeded the upper limit of industry management and requires the law to take action in time.

context:
### Idiom: 慈悲为本
### Meaning: 慈悲慈善和怜悯。原佛教语，以恻隐怜悯之心为根本。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 同时，作为国内财产保险机动车辆保险领域的主要专家，翻译多部国外学术著作，开设专业课程，培养专业人才，为国内机动车辆保险的科学化、现代化作出了贡献。他的思想主张以仁政为本，以慈悲为本，以礼义为本，以和谐为本，以爱国为本，以节俭为本，以宽容为本，以谦虚为本，以智慧为本，以勤勉为本，以善良为本，以正义为本，以和平为本，以自由为本，以平等为本，以友爱为本，以和谐为本，以自强为本，以自信为本，以自尊为本，以自立为本，以自强不息为本，以自由自在为本，以自由平等为本，以自由友爱为本，以自由和谐为本，以自由自信为本，以自由自尊为本，以自由自立为本，以自由自强不息为本。弟弟袁驷，是清华大学土木工程专业教授。
target: His philosophy is based on 仁政,慈悲,礼义,和谐,爱国,节俭,宽容,谦虚,智慧,勤勉,善良,正义,和平,自由,平等,友爱,和谐,自强,自信,自尊,自立,自立不息。

context:
### Idiom: 游目骋怀
### Meaning: 游目远眺；骋怀放开胸怀，往远处想。纵目四望，开阔心胸。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 舟凡五艘，中有滊动机名约见取丸，先一小时启航。团员争先登舟者凡二十七人，是日，天气晴朗，薰风习习，仰观宇宙之大，俯瞰沧溟之远，游目骋怀，逸兴遄飞，致足乐也。岂意乐未极而悲生，景未观而祸起，忽而黑云四赽，而天地晦冥；风雨骤至，而浊浪排空。
target: There were five boats, and among them, there was a steamer named "Yao Ying", which started at 10:00. A total of 27 people competed to get on the boat, and today the weather was clear, the breeze was gentle, and looking up at the vast cosmos and down at the boundless expanse, we felt free and happy. However, we were unaware that we would be sad and that disaster would come. Suddenly, dark clouds covered the sky and the earth was shrouded in darkness. The wind and rain came suddenly, and the turbid waves were swept away.

context:
### Idiom: 运筹帷幄
### Meaning: 谓在后方决定作战策略。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 看似人畜无害，破绽多，但却是一顶一的武学高手，拥有100%空手接 白刃的强大技能。朝中重臣，生性狡诈阴险，老奸巨猾，心狠手辣，做事滴水不漏，在朝中运筹帷幄，是皇帝之下的二号人物，深得皇帝的宠信。明面上萧慕苓是治国有方的忠臣，但背地里勾结外敌，为了自己的利益通奸卖国。
target: It seems harmless and full of loopholes, but it is a strong master of martial arts. It has 100% skill to fight with a bare sword. The senior minister of the court, the nature is cunning and cunning, old and shrewd, cruel and ruthless, and everything is meticulous. He is the second person in the court, and is deeply trusted by the emperor. On the surface, Xiao Mumu is a loyal minister who is good at governing the country. However, he colluded with the enemy behind the scenes, and sold the country for his own interests.

context:
### Idiom: 酒囊饭袋
### Meaning: 囊口袋。只会吃喝，不会做事。讥讽无能的人。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: ”正因为自己的影响力不断扩大，普里戈任才有底气充当批评军事将领的少数派。普里戈任直接批评国防部，说国防部的官员是酒囊饭袋。他也批评俄罗斯的其他精英，包括议会议员和寡头，其中他指责寡头在战争期间“偷走了一切原本属于人民的东西”。
target: "It is precisely because his influence continues to expand that Prigogine has the confidence to be among the few who criticize military generals. Prigogine directly criticizes the Ministry of Defense, saying that the officials of the Ministry of Defense are good-for-nothings. He also criticizes other elites in Russia, including parliamentarians and oligarchs, among whom he accuses the oligarchs of "stealing everything that originally belonged to the people" during the war."

context:
### Idiom: 大惊小怪
### Meaning: 形容对不足为奇的事情过分慌张或诧异。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 台积电新厂工地从台湾烧到美国，PTT股板网友讨论也爆棚，有人觉得事有蹊跷，‘台积工地一直烧，不想盖也别这样’、‘现在库存多 正好可以拖时间’、‘慢慢盖没差’、‘又拿保险金，喷喷喷’、‘发炉了要喷了 上看一千’。还有网友推论，‘慢慢盖 晚盖一个月少赔一个’、‘台gg怎么也变聪明了’、‘原来这就是谈判的筹码’、‘之前经验 火灾就是喷’、‘工地而已 大惊小怪’、‘各种理由拖延啊 大利多’。台积电ADR周五（28日）收涨0.75%至84.3美元，盘后股价小跌0.01%
target: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company's (TSMC) new factory construction site was transported from Taiwan to the United States. The PTT bulletin board users discussed this topic, and some people felt that there was something suspicious. "The TSMC construction site has been on fire, and it is not necessary to delay the construction. "The current inventory is sufficient, and we can take our time. "Slowly, there is no hurry. "The insurance money is used to spray. "The furnace is fired, and it is time to spray. "The original plan was to build in one month, but now it will take one month longer. "The original plan was to build in one month, but now it will take one month longer. "The original plan was to build in one month, but now it will take one month longer. "The original plan was to build in one month, but now it will take one month longer. "The original plan was to build in one month, but now it will take one month longer.

### Idiom: 一统天下
### Meaning: ①统一全国。②比喻为某种势力或某些人所把持的局面。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 岐阜地理位置绝佳，靠近堪称日本东西部边界的东山道(*3)不破关（关原町），同时也是向京都拓展势力的理想据点。就是从那时起，信长开始使用刻有“天下布武”字样的印章，可见他已然正式开启了一统天下霸业的进程。青年织田信长雕像耸立于岐阜公园入口处，背对岐阜。
target: 岐阜 is a very good location, near the border of the East Coast of Japan, the Toyama-do (*3) Nono-hara (Gan-hara), and is a strategic base for extending the empire to Kyoto. It was from this time that Shōwa began using a stamp bearing the words "rule the world", showing that he had started the process of establishing a single empire. The young Shōwa statue stands at the entrance of the 岐阜 Park, facing 岐阜.

context:
### Idiom: 怀山襄陵
### Meaning: 指洪水汹涌奔腾溢上山陵。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 显而易见，探寻舜帝故里，应该采信的是孟子的舜生东夷说。《尚书•尧典》载：尧时“汤汤洪水方割，荡荡怀山襄陵，浩浩滔天，下民其咨。”王国维《殷周制度论》云：“以地理言之，则虞、夏、商皆居东土。
target: It is clear that in searching for the roots of 舜, we should believe the theory of Genesis of Luke. The book of Genesis says: "Titus took a large amount of water, and when the water broke, the mountains stood still, and the people were very angry." The book of Genesis also says that 舜 was born in the East.

context:
### Idiom: 相貌堂堂
### Meaning: 形容人的仪表端正魁梧。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 该名读音是[Willard]，该名整体看起来很最酷，也很活泼，这样给小男士起名也很有寓意，表示父母希望小男士受人赏识，幽默风趣、铮铮铁骨，在各个方面有所成就。此英文名字，中文音译为叶奇尔，长度为5，与众不同悦耳动听，适合大家英文起名，作为男性子名字，展现相貌堂堂倔强上镜的品格特点。威拉德包含的寓意。
target: The pronunciation of the name is [Willard]. The name as a whole looks very cool and lively. Giving such a name to a young boy also has a symbolic meaning, indicating that the parents hope that the young boy will be appreciated by others, humorous and witty, with a strong character, and achieve in various aspects. This English name is transliterated in Chinese as Ye Qier, with a length of 5, unique and pleasing to the ear, suitable for everyone to use as an English name, serving as a male child's name, showing a strong and handsome character. The implied meaning contained in Willard.

context:
### Idiom: 有教无类
### Meaning: 类：类别。不管什么人都可以受到教育。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 佛光山开山宗长星云大师 在二○二三年二月五日圆寂，享年九十七岁。当时华文媒体天天都报导他春风化雨、有教无类的人生。不觉忆起，在九○年初有数年和星云大师面对面接触之缘。
target: Master Xingyun, the founder of Fo Guang Shan, passed away on February 5, 2023, at the age of 97. At that time, Chinese-language media reported daily on his life of teaching without discrimination, like a spring rain. It reminds me of the years in the early 90s when I had the opportunity to interact with Master Xingyun face to face.

context:
### Idiom: 藏器待时
### Meaning: 器用具，引伸为才能。比喻学好本领，等待施展的机会。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 此感慨铺叙之伦也。末以时命自安，藏器待时之意，为在会不得志诸君子慰藉。再自叙同此沦落，而壮志不衰。
target: This emotion is also the ethics of narration. At the end of the day, I am at peace with my destiny, and I hide my weapons and wait for the time. This is to comfort the gentlemen who are not ambitious in this meeting. Then I describe myself as having fallen into the same situation, but my ambition has not diminished.
